detectors.description:
Infura.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#56-69) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#62)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#63)
detectors.markdown:
[Infura.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L56-L69) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L62)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L63)

detectors.description:
Infura.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#71-85) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#77)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#78)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#79)
detectors.markdown:
[Infura.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L71-L85) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L77)
	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L78)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#L79)

detectors.description:
Infura.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#51-54) should emit an event for: 
	- valid = isValid (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#53)
solc-0.5.1 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.5.1 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Infura.smartfastConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#27-104) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 400000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#29)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#17)
	- Infura.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#37-39)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Infura.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#43-45)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#18)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#19)
	- Infura.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#47-49)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#21)
	- Infura.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#87-91)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#22)
	- Infura.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#56-69)

validate(uint8) should be declared external:
	- Infura.validate(uint8) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol#51-54)
function approve(address spender, uint256 value) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Infura.sol)#87
